entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Perf improvement: connectionclose #57788
  • Blazor Server Side: await Task.Delay needed in order to get UI to refresh #57781
  • Perf regression: fortunes, plaintext #57778
  • HubConnection docs don't specify what happens to `Task`s spawned on events #57777
  • Modify `ChangeDetection.IsKnownImmutableType` to support custom immutable types w/o perf impact #57776

Closed

  • Close outdated milestones #57702
    9.0-rc2
  • [9.0-preview.4] Remove default tag with the assembly name from OpenAPI document #55884
    9.0-preview6
  • [Infrastructure] JS infrastructure next steps #52965
  • We are running into "InvalidOperationException: Unable to resolve service for type" issues but from what we can see the code seems right? #57703
  • Collocation JavaScript file breaks Hot Reload #57599
    9.0-rc2
  • [Blazor] Build acceleration breaks blazor web apps. #57460
    9.0-rc2
  • @attribute [Authorize] does not work and does not redirect #57745
  • Perf improvement: fortunes, fortunes #57751
  • Perf regression: caching #57769

PullRequests

Created

  • Add a note about when to validate ping payloads #57795
    area-networking
  • Provide `Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.QuickGrid.EntityFrameworkAdapter` package README #57794
    area-blazor
  • Provide `Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.QuickGrid` package README #57793
    area-blazor
  • Provide `Microsoft.AspNetCore.JsonPatch` package README #57792
    area-mvc
  • Provide `Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.WebAssembly.Authentication` package README #57791
    area-blazor
  • Provide `Microsoft.AspNetCore.TestHost` package README #57790
    area-hosting
  • [release/9.0] [Identity][Templates] Ensure placeholders don't overlap with text #57789
    area-mvc
  • Provide `Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.Facebook` package README #57786
    area-security
  • Provide `Microsoft.Extensions.Caching.StackExchangeRedis` package README #57785
    feature-caching
  • [Identity][Templates] Ensure placeholders don't overlap with text #57783
    area-mvc
  • Note fire-and-forget status of HubConnection event tasks #57779
    area-signalr, community-contribution

Merged

  • Provide `Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.Google` package README #57768
    area-security, 10.0-preview1
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0' => 'main' #57716
    area-infrastructure, 10.0-preview1
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `ff233bd` to `0953a17` #57613
    area-infrastructure, pending-ci-rerun, 10.0-preview1
  • [release/9.0] [Static Assets] Improve development experience #57764
    Servicing-approved, area-ui-rendering, 9.0-rc2
  • Update ANCM file monitoring to hopefully avoid unneeded shutdowns #57735
    area-networking, 10.0-preview1
  • Disable launching browser on Web API template #57682
    Servicing-approved, area-mvc, 9.0-rc2
  • Provide `Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.WebAssembly.Server` package README #57774
    area-blazor, 10.0-preview1
  • Remove area- assignment rule as we now rely on dotnet-issue-labeler #57775
    area-infrastructure, 10.0-preview1

Updated

  • Add analyzer for custom IProblemDetailsWriter registration #49286
    area-mvc, analyzer, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-minimal
  • Fix `E2ETest.ServerExecutionTests.CircuitTests.ComponentLifecycleMethodThrowsExceptionTerminatesTheCircuit` #57604
    area-blazor, * NO MERGE *, pending-ci-rerun
  • Provide `Microsoft.Extensions.Http.Polly` package README #57771
    area-networking
  • Provide `Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.Negotiate` package README #57772
    area-security
  • Microsoft.extensions.api description.server allow specifying environment #55836
    area-commandlinetools, community-contribution, pr: pending author input, pending-ci-rerun, 10.0-preview1
  • Feature/httpendpoint #57565
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Provide `Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.WebAssembly` package README #57773
    area-blazor
  • [OutputCaching] OutputCacheOptions.ApplicationServices is always null during initialization #55847
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-middleware
  • Perf improvement: Fix Cumulative Layout Shift issue in blank Blazor templates #57213
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
